short_description: Imputation is the process of replacing missing data with substituted values. TD_SimpleImputeFit is a function to find out such substituted values based on the user input. Available options are Min, Max, Mean, Median, Mode, <Literal-value>.
long_description: Imputation is the process of replacing missing data with substituted values. TD_SimpleImputeFit is a function to find out such substituted values based on the user input. Available options are Min, Max, Mean, Median, Mode, <Literal-value>.

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.rDescription: The relation that contains input data.
input_tables.description: The relation that contains input data.

output_tables.name: OutputTable
output_tables.rDescription: Specifies the name of the table in which the output of TD_SimpleImputeFit can be stored.
output_tables.description: Specifies the name of the table in which the output of TD_SimpleImputeFit can be stored.

argument_clauses.name: ColsForStats
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the input table columns for which stats needs to be calculated
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input table columns for which stats needs to be calculated

argument_clauses.name: ColsForLiterals
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the input table columns for which Literals needs to be imputed
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input table columns for which Literals needs to be imputed

argument_clauses.name: PartitionColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the input table colum on which partition needs to be done
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input table colum on which partition needs to be done

argument_clauses.name: Stats
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the Stats to be computed on input table columns
argument_clauses.description: Specify the Stats to be computed on input table columns

argument_clauses.name: Literals
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the Literal value to be imputed on input table columns
argument_clauses.description: Specify the Literal value to be imputed on input table columns
